thread.title: Family affair as brave Catherine Britt weds love of her life James Beverley
thread.title_full: Family affair as brave Catherine Britt weds love of her life James Beverley | DailyTelegraph

author: Jonathon Moran
title: Family affair as brave Catherine Britt weds love of her life James Beverley
text:
COUNTRY singer Catherine Britt has wed long-time boyfriend James Beverley in Newcastle.
The 30-year-old, who is undergoing chemotherapy treatment for breast cancer, this weekend also released a moving video clip (far right) for her new single We’re All Waiting from her latest ARIA Award-nominated album Boneshaker.
The brave singer appears bald in the clip, in which she shares scenes with her new husband. The couple romantically kiss and embrace as he hands her a bunch of red roses.
Britt was yesterday walked down the aisle by her father Steve, who also officiated the service in front of family and friends, among them country muso Bill Chambers.
Catherine Britt and James Beverley seal the deal with a kiss. “The wedding has kept me positive, having something to look forward to. I’m pumped for it. I can’t wait to marry the love of my life,” she told Confidential ahead of yesterday’s nuptials.
“I invested in a really beautiful wig for my wedding because I wanted to feel normal for the day, but I’m also kind of embracing the fact that you can’t ignore the elephant in the room — I am bald and that is the way it is.”
